Posts.Content: Aug 16, 2014 07:01PM HappyMamaof2 wrote: Thank you!  Everything going into the procedure was referred to as biopsy and the discharge instructions had biopsy, lumpectomy and mastectomy on them - highlighting what I had done due to they different recovery of the 3 and my highlighted recovery schedule and post-op instructions were for lumpectomy.  I automatically worried but very glad it was all removed.  I appreciate you easing my mind!
Posts.Title: I had a lumpectomy not biopsy for lump. Should I be worried? HappyMamaof2 HappyMamaof2
